UpdSqls.Sql: ALTER TABLE `TRAFFIC_EVENT_INFO` ADD INDEX PATH_INDEX (`PICPATH`);
ALTER TABLE `NUMBER_PLATE_INFO` ADD INDEX PATH_INDEX (`PICPATH`);
ALTER TABLE `SYSTEM_EVENT_INFO` ADD INDEX STATUS_INDEX (`STATUS`,`TIME`);
ALTER TABLE `TRAFFIC_STATISTIC_INFO` ADD INDEX STATUS_INDEX (`STATUS`,`TIME`);
ALTER TABLE `NUMBER_PLATE_INFO` ADD INDEX STATUS_INDEX (`STATUS`,`TIME`);
ALTER TABLE `TRAFFIC_EVENT_INFO` ADD INDEX STATUS_INDEX (`STATUS`,`BEGIN_TIME`);

CREATE TABLE `VIDEO_FILE_INFO` (`ID` bigint(20) NOT NULL auto_increment,`CHANNEL` int(11) default NULL,`BEGIN_TIME` datetime default NULL,`BEGIN_MITIME` int(11) default NULL,`END_TIME` datetime default NULL,`END_MITIME` int(11) default NULL,`PATH` varchar(256) default NULL,`VIDEO_TYPE` int(11) default NULL,`STATUS` tinyint(4) default NULL,PRIMARY KEY (`ID`),KEY `TIME_INDEX` (`BEGIN_TIME`),KEY `PATH_INDEX` (`PATH`),KEY `STATUS_INDEX` (`STATUS`,`BEGIN_TIME`)) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
alter table CHAN_INFO add CHAN_PRESET int(11);
alter table CHAN_INFO add MONITOR_ID int(11);
alter table CHAN_INFO add VIDEO_ID int(11);
alter table CHAN_INFO add USERNAME varchar(16);
alter table CHAN_INFO add PASSWD varchar(16);
CREATE TABLE `PIC_INFO` ( `ID` bigint(20) NOT NULL auto_increment, `PIC_ID` bigint(20) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`)) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
INSERT INTO `PIC_INFO` VALUES ('1', '1');
alter table PIC_INFO add VIDEO_ID bigint(20) default NULL;
alter table CHAN_INFO add YUV_FORMAT int(11);
alter table CHAN_INFO add VIDEO_BEGINTIME datetime;
alter table CHAN_INFO add VIDEO_ENDTIME datetime;
alter table CHAN_INFO add WORKMODE int(11);
alter table CHAN_INFO add CAMERAIP varchar(16);
alter table CHAN_INFO add CAM_MULTI_IP varchar(16);
alter table CHAN_INFO add CAMERASELF_ID int(11) default 0;
update CHAN_INFO set CAMERASELF_ID = 0;
alter table CHAN_INFO modify CHAN_PLACE varchar(64);
alter table CHAN_INFO add REGISTER_ID varchar(48);
alter table TRAFFIC_EVENT_INFO add DIRECTION int(11);
alter table TRAFFIC_EVENT_INFO add TIMESECOND datetime;
alter table TRAFFIC_EVENT_INFO add MITIMESECOND int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add DIRECTION int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add VIDEOPATH varchar(255);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add VIDEOSAVE tinyint(4);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add TIMESECOND datetime;
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add MITIMESECOND int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add FLAG int default 0;
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add PIC_FLAG int default 0;
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add VIDEO_FLAG int default 0;

CREATE TABLE `NUMBER_PLATE_INFO_RECV` ( `ID` bigint(20) NOT NULL auto_increment, `NUMBER` varchar(20) default NULL, `COLOR` int(11) default NULL, `CREDIT` int(11) default NULL, `CHANNEL` int(11) default NULL, `ROAD` int(11) default NULL, `TIME` datetime default NULL, `MITIME` int(11) default NULL, `SMALLPICSIZE` int(11) default NULL, `SMALLPICWIDTH` int(11) default NULL, `SMALLPICHEIGHT` int(11) default NULL, `PICSIZE` int(11) default NULL, `PICWIDTH` int(11) default NULL, `PICHEIGHT` int(11) default NULL, `POSLEFT` int(11) default NULL, `POSTOP` int(11) default NULL, `POSRIGHT` int(11) default NULL, `POSBOTTOM` int(11) default NULL, `PICPATH` varchar(255) default NULL, `SMALLPICPATH` varchar(255) default NULL, `STATUS` tinyint(4) default NULL COMMENT '状态', `CARCOLOR` int(11) default NULL COMMENT '车身颜色', `TYPE` int(11) default NULL COMMENT '类型', `FACTORY` int(11) default NULL COMMENT '厂家', `SPEED` double default NULL, `PIC_ID` bigint(20) default NULL, `CARCOLORWEIGHT` int(11) default NULL, `CARCOLORSECOND` int(11) default NULL, `CARCOLORWEIGHTSECOND` int(11) default NULL, `CARNUMBER_TYPE` int(11) default NULL, `CONTOUR_WIDTH` int(11) default NULL, `PECCANCY_KIND` int(11) default NULL, `TYPE_DETAIL` int(11) default NULL, `DIRECTION` int(11) default NULL, `VIDEOPATH` varchar(255) default NULL, `VIDEOSAVE` tinyint(4) default NULL, `TIMESECOND` datetime default NULL, `MITIMESECOND` int(11) default NULL, `PLACE` varchar(255) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`), KEY `TIME_INDEX` (`TIME`), KEY `PATH_INDEX` (`PICPATH`), KEY `STATUS_INDEX` (`STATUS`,`TIME`)) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add REDLIGHT_TIME int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add PLACE varchar(255);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add CrossingNumber varchar(32);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add REDLIGHT_BEGIN_TIME datetime;
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add REDLIGHT_BEGIN_MITIME int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add REDLIGHT_END_TIME datetime;
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add REDLIGHT_END_MITIME int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add LIMIT_SPEED int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add OVER_SPEED int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add LATITUDE int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add LONGITUDE int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO_RECV add CrossingNumber varchar(32);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add INDEX VIDEO_INDEX (`VIDEOPATH`);
alter table VIDEO_FILE_INFO add INDEX VIDEO_INDEX (`PATH`);
alter table TRAFFIC_EVENT_INFO add INDEX VIDEO_INDEX (`VIDEOPATH`);

CREATE TABLE `DEVICE_STATUS`(`JXDM` varchar(15) default NULL,`JCSJ` datetime default NULL,`ZTLX` varchar(15) default NULL,`ZTMS` int(11) default NULL,`YCXX` varchar(100) default NULL) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `VIDEO_RECORD` ( `ID` bigint(20) NOT NULL auto_increment,`VIDEOPATH` varchar(255) default NULL, `TYPE` int(11) default NULL, `FLAG` int(11) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`)) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
alter table CHAN_INFO add column DEVICE_ID varchar(32) default NULL
alter table VIDEO_RECORD add CAMERAID int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add SUBFACTORY int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add SUBTYPE_DETAIL int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add CAMERA_ID int(11);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add STATUS2 tinyint(4);
alter table NUMBER_PLATE_INFO add STATUS3 tinyint(4);
